mapper.insert: insert into internal_settlement (project_id, company_id, duration, quality, safety, cost, internal_cost, extra_award, cst_create, cst_modified) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{internalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extraAward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into internal_settlement (project_id, company_id, duration, quality, safety, cost, internal_cost, extra_award, cst_create, cst_modified) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{internalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extraAward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), now()) on duplicate key update duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quality = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety = #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, internal_cost = #{internalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, extra_award = #{extraAward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cst_modified = now()
mapper.update: update internal_settlement set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quality = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety = #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, internal_cost = #{internalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, extra_award = #{extraAward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cst_create = #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_modified = #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select project_id, company_id, duration, quality, safety, cost, internal_cost, extra_award, cst_create, cst_modified from internal_settlement where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select project_id, company_id, duration, quality, safety, cost, internal_cost, extra_award, cst_create, cst_modified from internal_settlement
